title: Trotter's Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description:
Serves meat, veg options available. Offers several vegan choices that are clearly marked on menu. Possibility other items can be made vegan. Sources mostly organic, seasonal and local ingredients. Uses eco-friendly packaging and encourages customers to bring own containers. 
Listed on the farm to table Know Where Your Food Comes From website.
